meanings.sent3: The rock claimed it was uneatable, even for a hungry squirrel.
meanings.sent4: The idea of swimming in that murky water was as uneatable as a rotten apple.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the garbage was so uneatable that it made everyone gag.

meanings.sent3: The fashion disaster was so uneatable that it became a meme.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was as uneatable as a bitter pill.
meanings.sent5: The thought of wearing that outfit was uneatable, like trying to swallow a whole lemon.
